text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, monandi afrode naʙosed, ki kufr varzidand va dar ʙorai ʙarodaronason – hangome ki [dar paji kasʙi ruzi] ʙa safar raftand [va murdand] jo dar cang sirkat kardand [va kusta sudand] – guftand: "Agar onon nazdi mo ʙudand, namemurdand va kusta namesudand". [In e'tiqod dar vucudason nihoda sud] To Alloh taolo [ʙad-in guna anduh va] hasrate dar dilhojason karor dihad; va Alloh taolo [ast, ki] zinda mekunad va memironad; va Alloh taolo ʙa on ci mekuned, ʙinost
